title: Upper Kitchens Are Open!
description: BC Dining has reopened the Upper Kitchens for Student use. Please follow all policies and clean after yourself.

title: Vegan Options Expanded!
description: We've heard you loud and clear! Starting today, check the new menu's to see our newest Vegan options including Vegan Ice Cream @ Addies

title: Searching For Test-Groups!
description: With the semester coming to a close, we'd like to hear your thoughts on our newest food offerings. Please contact bcdining@bc.edu if you're interested to learn more

title: Updated Accommodations
description: After a successful transition, we're pleased to continue the to-go scheduled meal pickup process. Please contact the BC dietitians for more information.
